DOC.brief_summary: Since intrathecal fentanyl is known to sedation effect, intrathecal fentanyl will result in lowering propofol requirement for conscious sedation under spinal anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: The Optimal Effect Site Concentration of Propofol for Conscious Sedation in Elderly Male Patients Undergoing Urologic Surgery Under Spinal Anesthesia With or Without Intrathecal Fentanyl
DOC.criteria: elderly male patients undergoing urologic surgery under spinal anesthesia patients with any comorbidity
